metadata.synopsis: If players didn't finish Paladins of Tyr nor don't know about Karlach's infernal engine she will remind them about that. If they decide to continue without helping her she permanently leaves the party.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Recruit Karlach and use any of the teleporters to leave Act 1.

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: Hey, soldier. We've got a long way ahead of us - and there's something I want to tell you.
5.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: Don't worry. It's nothing bad. Well. Depending.

49.speaker: Karlach
49.text: Hey, soldier. I'm getting a little nervous. We're getting further and further from those pricks who were hunting me.
49.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

30.speaker: Karlach
30.text: I'm not willing to let servants of Zariel roam the Sword Coast unchecked. Or to regroup and come after me again. Let's go get 'em. Together.
30.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I already took care of those Paladins of Tyr  - you don't need to worry about them anymore.
9.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: You... did? Wow. That was sound of you. Why'd you do it?
2.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I always take care of my people.

43.speaker: Karlach
43.text: Glad to be counted among them. Really glad.

33.speaker: Karlach
33.text: Wish I could've been there to watch those ignots crumble, but I'm just happy they're off my tail.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: They were agents of a devil. I wasn't going to let them roam the area unchallenged.
1.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I'm always keen for a good fight.
15.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

50.speaker: Karlach
50.text: Same. Wish you would've brought me along for the ride, but I'm just happy those ignots are off my tail.
50.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

18.speaker: Karlach
18.text: Then again, facing 'em down might've put my tin can into overdrive.
18.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

32.speaker: Karlach
32.text: Hear that? Infernal engine for a heart. Lets me burn as hot as the Hells. Thing's been running in overdrive since I left Avernus.
32.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Hear that?"
She thumps her left chest with right hand, like pounding a car hood. Something mechanic clangs within.
(etc.)NodeContext: A bit more tired/ worn out than when she says this in Act 1 (this is only if she hasn't told player about her heart by act 2)

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: Won't be seeing my mechanic any time soon, so I've been making the most of the extra heat. But it's meant I can't get too friendly. If I'm excited, nervous, scared, I'll light you up like a firework.
7.context: NodeContext: First time discussing the origin of her heart

6.speaker: Player
6.text: How the hells did you get an infernal engine for a heart?
6.context: NodeContext: First time discussing the origin of her heart

23.speaker: Karlach
23.text: High pain tolerance. And a dynamic duo of truly shitty bosses.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: You have a mechanic for your heart?
45.context: NodeContext: First time discussing the origin of her heart

11.speaker: Karlach
11.text: Wild, right? And believe it or not, I'm one of Zariel's least-mutilated pets.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: What does the engine allow you to do?
19.context: NodeContext: First time discussing the origin of her heart

10.speaker: Karlach
10.text: Burn, baby. As hot as I can tolerate. I have to admit it helps in battle, though I wouldn't have chosen it for myself - if I'd been given a choice.
10.context: NodeContext: First time discussing the origin of her heart

37.speaker: Karlach
37.text: I'll tell you the story, but I really need to find someone who can tune up my engine sooner rather than later. Believe me when I say this thing is hot.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: The first time I faced down those 'paladins,' they let slip they'd met an infernal mechanic in the area. A tiefling. But I didn't see him anywhere.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Wonder if they meant Dammon - a tiefling weaponsmith.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: A weaponsmith, huh? Not sure if he's the guy, but I'd love to find out. A tune-up would do this rusty heart a world of good.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: There are some tieflings holed up in a druid's grove nearby. We might look there.

51.speaker: Karlach
51.text: Sounds like a good lead. Hopefully, our guy will be among them. A tune-up would do this old tub a world of good.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I'll keep an eye out for someone like that.

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: Thanking you. A tune-up would give this rustbox of mine a new lease on life.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: What'll happen if you don't get tuned up?

16.speaker: Karlach
16.text: Who knows! Maybe I can run like this indefinitely. But... maybe not.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I met someone who might be able to help - a smith who worked in the Hells for a time.

40.speaker: Karlach
40.text: Well now! Maybe I could make his acquaintance? A tightened screw or two might let me keep a little calmer.

48.speaker: Karlach
48.text: Maybe even manage a pat or bump without burning someone to death. It's been a long time.

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: If you can lead the way, I'll gladly follow.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Agreed. We'll make sure they can't hurt anyone again.
22.context: NodeContext: If this goes badly, she could leave the party. So medium tension.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: We have important things to do, Karlach. Cutting down Zariel's lackeys isn't one of them.
41.context: NodeContext: If this goes badly, she could leave the party. So medium tension.

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: It's important to me. Are you going to help me or not?
12.context: NodeContext: If this goes badly, she could leave the party. So medium tension.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: If it's that important to you, you have my support. We'll find them together.
38.context: NodeContext: Surprised. The player has said they aren't going to solve her quest with her.

20.speaker: Karlach
20.text: Before we head off, there's something I want you to know.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: It's not a priority. Get in line or go it alone.
25.context: NodeContext: Surprised. The player has said they aren't going to solve her quest with her.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.context: NodeContext: Surprised. The player has said they aren't going to solve her quest with her.

42.speaker: Karlach
42.text: If this is really goodbye, soldier, I guess... well... thanks for everything. I'd hoped we'd be able to stick together a bit longer, but that's life, isn't it.
42.context: NodeContext: Surprised. The player has said they aren't going to solve her quest with her.

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: Good luck. I'm gonna miss you. You better miss me too. Or else.
26.context: NodeContext: Leaving the party and sad about it, but hiding behind a bit of humor as a defense.
